text: [Music]
hi I'm Matt Wood from AWS and I wanted
to show you just how quick and easy it
is to set up life cycle policies for
objects in S3 so here I have a new
bucket in S3 and I have versioning
switched on and to create a new life
cycle rule all I have to do is Click add
rule from there I can apply the policy
and the rules to the whole bucket or to
objects inside that bucket which start
with the prefix I can go ahead and
configure the rule rules for both the
current version and for previous
versions of objects inside that bucket
you can see how easy it is to transition
objects between storage classes I can go
ahead and transition objects to
infrequent access I can move them to
glacia I can even expire and remove them
after this period of time you can see
that the console is showing us exactly
what the life cycle policy will look
like then I can just go ahead click
review activate the rule and I'm done
that's it thanks a lot
[Music]
